communications.subject: Florida Sunshine Law Request: FDLE State Exam Applicants
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Florida Sunshine Law, I hereby request the following records:

Information on all applicants who took the FDLE State Exam / State Officer Certification Examination going back as far as possible to the present. 

Data elements for all applicants:
* Applicant's full name
* Date of exam
* Applicant's date of birth or, if not releasable, year of birth or age at time of exam
* Applicant's city and/or zip code of residence at time of exam
* Applicant's score on the exam
* Whether applicant passed the exam

Please include this information for an applicant for as many times as they took the exam. If your certification system contains data elements not listed above, please include them in the response, provided they are releasable under the law. On the other hand, I recognize some of the information I am asking for may not be tracked by your system. If that is the case, I am willing to accept as many of the data elements as your agency maintains. If some records are more readily available, I am happy to receive partial information as soon as possible while the remaining request is processed.

In addition to the data elements listed, I request documentation necessary to understand and interpret the data, including but not limited to record layouts, data dictionaries, code sheets, lookup tables, etc.

My preference is to receive structured data provided in a csv file. I can also handle a variety of other data formats including machine-readable text files, such as delimited or fixed-width formats, SQL databases, Excel workbooks and MS Access. If there are additional formats your agency would prefer to provide, please let me know.

Please send clarifications and questions via electronic communication at any time.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 10 business days.

Sincerely,

Aleksei Opacic

Aleksei Opacic
